definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
Messier catalog of nebulae and clusters (1784)
Messier catalog of nebulae and clusters (1784)

sentences.english: The trends of development of photographic catalogs are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了照相星表工作的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: If a quick catalog has previously been selected, that catalog will be loaded and displayed.
sentences.chinese: 如果先前有快速星表被選中，在目錄中就會有顯示。

sentences.english: A discussion of several errors of the data of ancient star catalogues of China is made.
sentences.chinese: 對影響中國古代星表數據的各種誤差進行了討論。

sentences.english: The history and significance of the sky survey and compiling catalogs are briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 該文簡述了巡天觀測和星表編制的歷史和意義。

sentences.english: Newly-added external data catalogs are not available for use in existing maps.
sentences.chinese: 新增加的星表對已經打開的星圖不起作用。

sentences.english: Click the mouse pointer over the "check box" to the left of the catalog name.
sentences.chinese: 指向並用鼠標單擊星表名稱左邊的“複選框”。

definition: Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies
Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies
Johannes Kepler (1571-1630), German astronomer and formulator of Kepler's laws of planetary motion
